text: Malin Beg (Gaeilge: Málain BhigLogainm - Malin Beg) is a small Gaeltacht village south of Glencolumbkille, County Donegal, Ireland. It is famous for its beach, the Silver Strand.Unique Ascent : Silver Strand, Malinbeg ==Demographics== ==References== Category:Gaeltacht places in County Donegal
title: Malin Beg
